events.title: BBQ & Bingo Bash 2023
events.description: BBQ & Bingo Bash is Aggies For Limbs' annual food event for this semester. A food event is held every April near Texas A&M University's campus and is open to all families. This event is a fun gathering where BBQ will be served and several rounds of bingo will be played with prizes given to the winners. 100% of proceeds will be given to Ashton's Angels.
features: Bingo games with prizes awarded to winners

events.title: Santa's Stroll 2023

location.name: Lot 50 on Texas A&M University Campus

events.description: Santa's Stroll is Aggies For Limbs' annual 5k event for this semester. A 5k event is held every November or December near Texas A&M University's campus and is open to all families. This event is a fun Christmas themed 5k run or walk to raise money for Ashton's Angels. 100% of proceeds will be given to Ashton's Angels.
features: Dress up in your favorite Christmas gear
Snacks to fill your belly after you run

schedule.notes: Check in will be in the parking lot. There will be free parking at the venue.

earlyBird.note: Ordering by 11/15 guarantees you an event t-shirt

general.note: T-shirts after 11/15 will be first come first serve
